content.title: State Agriculture Scholarship for B.Sc. & M.Sc. Agriculture
content.beneficiary: Students pursuing B.Sc. and M.Sc. in Agriculture
content.details: The scheme 'State Agriculture Scholarship for B.Sc. & M.Sc. Agriculture' was launched by the Department of Agriculture, Government of Nagaland to provide educational assistance to students who are undergoing undergraduate (B.Sc. Agriculture) and post-graduate programme (M.Sc. Agriculture). Objectives include strengthening human resource development by upgrading technical expertise and supporting students/scholars in Agriculture disciplines.
benefits: ₹700/- per month for B.Sc. Agriculture students
₹900/- per month for M.Sc. Agriculture students
eligibility: Inhabitants of Nagaland pursuing B.Sc. or M.Sc. Agriculture
Must be from an institution with a valid AISHE/UDISE code
Students who have failed in their last examination are not eligible
Must not be a beneficiary of any other scholarship scheme
content.application_process: Online - via Common Scholarship Portal: https://scholarship.nagaland.gov.in
documents_required: Copy of the Progress Report of the last semester
Admission Receipt from the respective institution
Copy of the front page of the Bank Passbook or Bank Statement
Institution Verification Form as per Annexure –I

faqs.question: What is the 'State Agriculture Scholarship for B.Sc. & M.Sc. Agriculture'?
faqs.answer: The scheme was launched by the Department of Agriculture, Government of Nagaland, to provide financial assistance to students pursuing undergraduate (B.Sc. Agriculture) and postgraduate (M.Sc. Agriculture) programs.

faqs.question: What are the objectives of the State Agriculture Scholarship?
faqs.answer: The main objectives are to strengthen human resource development by enhancing technical expertise and to support students/scholars undertaking graduate and postgraduate studies in Agriculture disciplines.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for this scholarship?
faqs.answer: Eligibility criteria include being an inhabitant of Nagaland enrolled in a B.Sc. or M.Sc. Agriculture programme, attending an institution with a valid AISHE/UDISE code, and not having failed the last examination.

faqs.question: What is the stipend amount provided under this scholarship?
faqs.answer: The stipend provided is ₹700/- per month for undergraduate (B.Sc. Agriculture) students and ₹900/- per month for postgraduate (M.Sc. Agriculture) students.

faqs.question: Are book grants included in this scholarship?
faqs.answer: Yes, apart from the stipend, students also receive book grants to support their academic expenses.

faqs.question: Can students pursuing Agriculture studies outside Nagaland apply for this scholarship?
faqs.answer: Yes, students pursuing Agriculture studies within or outside Nagaland are eligible for this scholarship as long as they meet the specified criteria.

faqs.question: Can the scholarship be renewed for multiple years?
How can I apply for the Scholarship?
faqs.answer: All eligible students shall apply through the Common Scholarship Portal: https://scholarship.nagaland.gov.in
